about_the_game:
This game is a VR experience of the Chinese intangible cultural heritage program - Cast Iron Flowers. You can experience the process of Cast Iron Flowers in the game!

You move and manipulate objects through the use of the VR grip, experiencing each process of Cast Iron Flowers and ultimately realizing it by gripping the willow sticks (Hua Bang)! You can feel the stunning immersion effect far beyond the normal video.

The optimized process is presented in the game as the following parts:
- Pick up the basket with broken iron pieces and pour the iron pieces in the basket into the designated furnace.
- Pick up the willow sticks (Hua Bang) used for Molten Iron Firework and go to the furnace to get liquid iron.
- Go to the bottom of the trellis (Hua Peng) and hit the willow sticks (Hua Bang) to complete the flower making process and enjoy the beautiful scenery.

As long as you follow the guidance in the scene to operate, you can feel the unique charm of the Chinese intangible cultural heritage program of Cast Iron Flowers, come and try!
